attributes.action: Reject  "The OptOut" Option being Pushed Forwarded By The Socalled Caring Health Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prime Minister Please do not accept a New System Whereby a person must "OptOut", if they Do Not want to Donate Organs or Bodily Parts when Deceased.
The present system is "Fair", not all people want to Donate. 
In recent years it has been highlighted that Health Service Organisations, have been Abusing this Practise, Do Not give them more Power.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
